Articles.Content: Still not using punctuation? IRONIC CHEATING!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Using an unholy amount of exclamation points? That is heresy cheating! non-cheating keyboard surfers always use an appropriate amount of punctuation.
Talking about grammar when you begin a sentence with a non-capitalized "non-cheating"? You are a cheater!
Complaining about grammar AND capitalization? Cheater!
Considering grammar separate from capitalisation? Cheater.
Guys, being Grammar Germans is not ok! No one is perfect!
Ironically misspelling capitalization? Oh boy, do we have some cheating over here! Learn some grammar, man. It's what all non-cheaters do.
Caring about grammar? This is 2014! We text, and you never see proper grammar in texts, DO YOU?!
I do! Cheater!
Curing Kessler Syndrome? That is nearly impossible, and only made possible through cheating! Just leave it alone, i'm sure it won't cause any problems. Cough gravity cough
Letting this game fall off the first page of Forum Games? Clearly you just want some privacy to conduct your cheating away from prying eyes. Real forum gamers keep the thread bumped.
Putting this game back on the first page? Only cheaters have that kind of power.
Editing Australia's Flag? chearer
Calling him a chearer? While i'm sure he makes people happy, I do believe you both are cheaters! Just stop now. We may forgive you.
Vague promises of forgiveness? Cheating by any reasonable standard. Forgive or forgive not, there is no "may".
Altering a Star Wars quote? Galactic Cheater!
How did you know it was a Star Wars quote unless you looked it up, cheater?
Everyone knows it by heart, except for cheaters!
Not accusing someone else of cheating? CHEATER! Real players always accuse others of cheating, and always follow the all-glorious ways of Stalin and his wonderful system of communism.
Communism is one giant circlejerk of cheating and you are a cheater for promoting it!
Driving a car with mechj automatic??? (why else would you make a wish for 3 pedals...) >:-] That's as low as a cheater can get.
Complaining about the use of MechjebAutomatic? Cheater to the highest degree. You have been sentenced to banishment.
Sentencing to banishment without proper authority? That's some low level cheating right there. Get authority, or don't pretend to have authority, cheater!
Cheater for being old before being young.
Well, considering I am young, and have never been old, I would call that assumption cheating. Get your facts straight, before you cheat.
